title: Voices of the Energy Industry – Affordability becomes the priority with Meghan Calabro
description: Meghan Calabro, Vice President at Burns & McDonnell, discusses grid modernization and affordability challenges for utilities and how solutions to them can be found at DTECH
content: Meghan Calabro, Vice President at Burns & McDonnell, discusses grid modernization and affordability challenges for utilities and how solutions to them can be found at DTECH
